thread.title: Syria’s Foreign Minister Says Airstrikes ‘Useless’ Without Coordination
thread.title_full: Syria’s Foreign Minister Says Airstrikes ‘Useless’ Without Coordination - WSJ

author: Farnaz Fassihi
title: Syria’s Foreign Minister Says Airstrikes ‘Useless’ Without Coordination
text:
UNITED NATIONS—Syria’s foreign minister said Friday that airstrikes in his country wouldn’t be effective unless they were coordinated with Syrian armed forces on the ground—as Russia was doing.
“Airstrikes are useless unless they are in cooperation with the Syrian army,” Walid Moallem told world leaders at the U.N. General Assembly. “Aerial is... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
